title: Week 4 Hot Take or Just Right? (Football 09/27)
description:
Nick Kostos and Will Brinson discuss Andrew Luck still not practicing (10:33), and Justin Timberlake possibly performing at the Super Bowl (11:38). Then, Nick is joined by Pete Prisco and Jason La Canfora for another edition of Hot Take or Just Right. The guys assign 'hot take' or 'just right' to questions including: if the Rams are the best team in the NFC West (18:25), if the Colts should trade Andrew Luck and stick with Jacoby Brissett (25:32), if Jaguars would win a Super Bowl if they were based out of London (32:09), and if the Giants are the worst team in the NFL (41:22).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy

itunes:author: CBS Sports, Football, NFL, NFL Picks, NFL Betting, 2022 NFL, NFL Predictions, NFL Recap
itunes:subtitle: Another edition of 'Hot Take or Just Right' asking if the Giants are the worst team in the NFL, if the Jags would win a Super Bowl if they called London home, and much more!
